title: Why does the pixel camera gets confused in a tube light setting and shows ribbons?
content:
I would like to report a defect in the camera app.

Background and description
When I point the camera towards a hall way with a vanilla background and lit by tube lights, the camera app starts to show moving ribbons in the screen. Like in the television if old times. 

When I click on the camera, the image contains the ribbons. 

Mitigation steps and result 
1. Restart the app. No impact 
2. Restart the phone. No impact 
3. Move the target to a non vanilla background. The  camera behaves correctly. When pointed back at the vanilla background it resumes the ribbons 

There are pictures and videos showing the defect here. 

https://photos.app.goo.gl/6UJteRfbYwftyVGv5

Hoping they are helpful and thankful for any suggestions and updates. 

Kind regards
Sesh
